title: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand
description: Bug 102516: JDBC Data Set Editor should load tables and columns on demand. The JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query has a tree control that lists the tables and columns in your data source.
OB: Currently, the tables and columns in the data source are loaded immediately when the page is opened.
EB: The tables and columns in the data source should be loaded on demand, either when the user expands the tree or applies a filter.
SR:
1. Open the JDBC Data Set Editor page for a SQL Query.
2. Observe that the tables and columns are immediately loaded.
3. Expand the tree or apply a filter to load the tables and columns on demand.
